titles.title: Strengthening Medicaid Coverage of MAT Act
Strengthening Medicaid Coverage of MAT Act

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to clarify that drugs and biologicals used for medication-assisted treatment under Medicaid are subject to the requirements of the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Medicaid Coverage of MAT Act
This bill specifically includes in the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program covered outpatient drugs that are used in medication-assisted treatment for opioid-use disorders.
